translation_id: sesungguhnya manusia benar-benar berada dalam kerugian,

arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ ەۙ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Il lal lazeena aamanu wa 'amilus saali haati wa tawa saw bil haqqi wa tawa saw bis sabr
transliteration_id: Illal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa tawāṣau bil-ḥaqq(i), wa tawāṣau biṣ-ṣabr(i).
translation_en: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
translation_id: kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal saleh serta saling menasihati untuk kebenaran dan kesabaran.
